name: A showcase of music
description:
The folder contains 3 different instances of the game, each instance varies in the music set to it to showcase how I can compose music to different styles as well as being flexible tomatching different elements of the game. 

Another game i have worked in collaboration with Puddygum Studios is "Play Now!" which features my music in it. 

Here is the link to that game: https://puddygum.itch.io/play-now 

Check it out.

To contact me send me a message on twitter, @ads9316

Also I will be starting a music channel on youtube soon, showcasing different compositions I am going to do this year. relevant information will be posted on here on twitter in due time.
